img_summary: The image depicts the "Willow Wood Staff," a weapon from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It serves as the default weapon at the start of Chapter 1 and is not craftable. The staff is visually represented with a wooden base and intricate carvings, aligning with its introductory role in the game.
